text: Stadio del Trampolino is a ski jumping hill located in Pragelato, Italy. During the 2006 Winter Olympics, it hosted the ski jumping and the ski jumping part of the Nordic combined events. It also hosted FIS Ski Jumping World Cup events in the 2004–05 and 2008–09 seasons. == References == *2006 Winter Olympics official report. Volume 3. pp. 70–1. *Profile of Stadio del Trampolino at www.skisprungschanzen.com Category:Venues of the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Ski jumping venues in Italy Category:Olympic Nordic combined venues Category:Olympic ski jumping venues
title: Stadio del Trampolino
